Texts.Chs: 太棒了！ 我们现在可以做狂欢派对主题的寿司了！
Texts.Eng: Brilliant! We can now have rave party themed sushi!

Texts.Chs: 除非我的食物不发光，我才勉为其难吃这个食物。
Texts.Eng: I prefer it when my food doesn't glow.

Texts.Chs: 看上去像莴苣拌面条，味道有点像芹菜。
Texts.Eng: It's like noodley lettuce that tastes a bit like celery.

Texts.Chs: 愚蠢的植物会发光。叶族人更聪明，不会发发发光。这种生存方式更好。
Texts.Eng: Sssilly plant glows. Floran sssmarter and not glow. Hunt better that way.

Texts.Chs: 这种植物会在成熟时发光。
Texts.Eng: This plant glows when it is ripe.

Texts.Chs: 这种植物看起来更适合在海底生长。
Texts.Eng: This plant looks like it would fit right in at the bottom of the sea.

Texts.Chs: This was a staple crop of ancient Kineptic since it was so easy to harvest at night.
Texts.Eng: This was a staple crop of ancient Kineptic since it was so easy to harvest at night.
